message: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

message: Habits are first cobwebs, then cables.
author: Spanish Proverb

message: The secret of your future is hidden in your daily routine.
author: Mike Murdock

message: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

message: You'll never change your life until you change something you do daily. The secret of your success is found in your daily routine.
author: John C. Maxwell

message: Your net worth to the world is usually determined by what remains after your bad habits are subtracted from your good ones.
author: Benjamin Franklin

message: Successful people are simply those with successful habits.
author: Brian Tracy

message: Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.
author: Warren Buffett

message: First we make our habits, then our habits make us.
author: Charles C. Noble

message: Excellence is not a singular act, but a habit. You are what you repeatedly do.
author: Shaquille O'Neal

message: Habit is either the best of servants or the worst of masters.
author: Nathaniel Emmons

message: You cannot change your future, but you can change your habits, and surely your habits will change your future.
author: Abdul Kalam

message: The difference between an amateur and a professional is in their habits. An amateur has amateur habits. A professional has professional habits.
author: Steven Pressfield

message: Good habits formed at youth make all the difference.
author: Aristotle

message: Your beliefs become your thoughts, your thoughts become your words, your words become your actions, your actions become your habits, your habits become your values, your values become your destiny.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

message: The quality of your life is determined by the quality of your habits.
author: Robin Sharma

message: Bad habits are like a comfortable bed, easy to get into, but hard to get out of.
author: Anonymous

message: The secret to permanently breaking any bad habit is to love something greater than the habit.
author: Bryant McGill

message: It is easier to prevent bad habits than to break them.
author: Benjamin Franklin

message: Small habits make a big difference. They are little things that make big things happen.
author: James Clear

message: Habits change into character.
author: Ovid

message: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.
author: James Clear

message: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

message: The chains of habit are too weak to be felt until they are too strong to be broken.
author: Samuel Johnson

message: It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.
author: Tony Robbins

message: The only way to make a habit stick is to make it part of your identity.
author: James Clear

message: The more deeply rooted a habit is, the harder it is to change. But it can be done.
author: B.F. Skinner

message: A habit cannot be tossed out the window; it must be coaxed down the stairs a step at a time.
author: Mark Twain

message: The strength of your habits decides the height of your success.
author: Robin Sharma

message: We become what we think about most of the time, and that's the strangest secret.
author: Earl Nightingale

message: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
author: Confucius

message: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

message: The earlier you start building good habits, the more time they have to compound in your favor.
author: James Clear

message: We are a product of our habits. What we repeatedly do forms our character.
author: Stephen Covey

message: Your habits will determine your future.
author: Jack Canfield

message: Good habits are as addictive as bad habits, and a lot more rewarding.
author: Harvey Mackay

message: Habit is persistence in practice.
author: Octavia Butler

message: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

message: The only difference between where you are today and where you'll be five years from now are the people you've met and the books you've read.
author: Charlie Jones

message: Excellence is a continuous process and not an accident.
author: Abdul Kalam

message: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
author: Vince Lombardi

message: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

message: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.'
author: Mary Anne Radmacher

message: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

message: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
author: Samuel Johnson

message: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
author: Albert Einstein

message: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
author: Thomas Paine

message: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

message: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

message: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

message: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

message: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

message: Every noble work is at first impossible.
author: Thomas Carlyle

message: Be not afraid of growing slowly; be afraid only of standing still.
author: Chinese Proverb

message: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Will Durant
